title: Mondaiji-tachi ga Isekai kara Kuru Sou Desu yo? - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Animal Characteristics   Clever Protagonist   Demon Lord   Female Protagonist   Folklore   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Godly Powers   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple Protagonists   Mythology   Parallel Worlds   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World
author: Tatsunoko Tarou
description:
Sakamaki Izayoi, Kudou Asuka, and Kasukabe Yō have tremendous powers and are bored with the regular world.

An envelope arrives for each person, and when each opens their envelope, they are stunned to see the scenery around them change to a world they had never encountered before. They’ve been summoned by the Black Rabbit to help the community “No Name” to overthrow the Demon Lords.>
